description: Trinkets for Breggle character generation. Small trinkets weigh 10 coins. The Referee should judge the weight of larger items.

items.name: Bag of Divination Stones
items.description: A bag of divination stones that always answer 'Panic' to any question.

items.name: Bloodstained Jester's Hat
items.description: A bloodstained jester's hat.

items.name: Bloody Knife
items.description: A bloody knife that cannot be cleaned.

items.name: Blue Velvet Jacket
items.description: A blue velvet jacket with a hidden pocket which moves when you're not looking. Every time you want to retrieve something from the pocket, it takes a minute of searching to find it.

items.name: Book of Bleating Poetry
items.description: A book of poetry that consists primarily of bleating.

items.name: Bottle of Noxious Perfume
items.description: A bottle of noxious perfume. When sprayed, it can be smelt up to half a mile away.

items.name: Brass Owl Statue
items.description: A brass owl statue with eerie black eyes.

items.name: Broken Fishing Rod
items.description: A broken fishing rod that still displays teeth marks from an enormous fish.

items.name: Moon Phase Amulet
items.description: A circular ceramic amulet which displays the current moon phase.

items.name: Clay Pot of Frog Paste
items.description: A clay pot labelled 'Frog Paste,' containing what appears to be frog paste.

items.name: Clump of Writhing Black Moss
items.description: A clump of writhing, black moss that you scraped off a looming monolith one lonely night.

items.name: Collection of Life Story Papers
items.description: A collection of papers with scrawled notes detailing your life story. The odd thing is that you found these notes on the corpse of a stranger, drowned in a ditch.

items.name: Mossling Gourd Instrument
items.description: A curious mossling wind instrument carved out of a gourd. You can't figure out which hole to blow in.

items.name: Mouse Jousting Diorama
items.description: A diorama of two stuffed mice riding stuffed squirrels, jousting.

items.name: Dried Mushroom with Face
items.description: A dried mushroom with a face.

items.name: Folio of Pressed Sprite-Wings
items.description: A folio of pressed sprite-wings.

items.name: Mossling-Shaped Root
items.description: A gnarled root shaped like a mossling.

items.name: Warning Letter About Crookhorns
items.description: A letter warning that several unnamed but high-ranked longhorns are secretly crookhorns in disguise.

items.name: King Pusskin Locket
items.description: A locket with a portrait of a fluffy cat wearing a crown with the inscription 'For the love of King Pusskin.'

items.name: Long-Nosed Masquerade Mask
items.description: A long-nosed masquerade mask.

items.name: Fairy-Perfumed Moleskin Wristband
items.description: A moleskin wristband, anointed with exotic fairy perfume.

items.name: Rainbow Smoke Mossling Pipe
items.description: A mossling pipe that blows rainbow-coloured smoke rings.

items.name: Necklace of Humanoid Teeth
items.description: A necklace of miscellaneous humanoid teeth.

items.name: Petrified Turnip
items.description: A petrified turnip.

items.name: Ichor-Oozing Pig Heart
items.description: A pig heart that oozes ichor when squeezed.

items.name: Mysteriously Heavy Pouch
items.description: A pouch which feels heavy (as if full of pebbles) even when empty.

items.name: Lord Malbleat's Rusty Scalpel
items.description: A rusty scalpel that once belonged to Lord Malbleat.

items.name: Sack of Fried Chicken Legs
items.description: A sack of tasty fried chicken legs.

items.name: Fish-Breggle Scale
items.description: A scale said to be from a breggle with a fishtail instead of legs.

items.name: Ancestral Prophetic Scroll
items.description: A scroll containing a prophetic warning from an esteemed ancestor. Age has made it almost indecipherable.

items.name: Sketch of Lost Love
items.description: A sheet of parchment with a charcoal sketch of your long lost love.

items.name: Fairy Fish Catching Gear
items.description: A short length of silver cord and a delicate hook, said to be able to catch fairy fish in puddles.

items.name: Grave-Stained Shovel
items.description: A shovel stained with the dirt of a thousand graves.

items.name: Stuffed Vole in Waistcoat
items.description: A stuffed vole dressed in a charming waistcoat.

items.name: Thigh-Bone Flute
items.description: A thigh-bone flute.

items.name: Cat-Maddening Tin Whistle
items.description: A tin whistle whose tones drive cats wild.

items.name: Tiny Book of Nonsense Poetry
items.description: A tiny book of nonsense poetry, bound in purple leather.

items.name: Painting of Four-Horned Goat
items.description: A tiny painting of a four-horned goat.

items.name: Goat-Head Walking Stick
items.description: A well-loved walking stick with a goat's head handle.

items.name: Nail-Studded Wooden Chapes
items.description: A wooden Chapes (holy symbol of the Pluritine Church) studded with nails.

items.name: Sunrise-Erasing Notebook
items.description: An empty notebook. Anything written in it disappears at sunrise.

items.name: Pilfered Ornate Pie Pan
items.description: An ornate pie pan, pilfered from a noble's kitchen.

items.name: Skull-Pip Black Stone Dice
items.description: Black stone dice with white skulls for pips.

items.name: Worthless Horn Jewellery
items.description: Expensive-looking (but worthless) jewellery, designed for breggle horns.

items.name: Legendary Hunter's Bowstring
items.description: String from the bow of a legendary hunter.

items.name: Fairy Chess Pieces
items.description: The board pieces for fairy chess. You have no idea what the rules are (or even if it's a real game).

items.name: Cured Deer Skin
items.description: The cured skin of a whole deer.

items.name: Ancestor's Horn Necklace
items.description: The horn of an ancestor, hung from a necklace.

items.name: Prison Cell Key
items.description: The key to the prison cell you escaped from.

items.name: Grandmother's Glass Eye
items.description: Your grandmother's creepy glass eye. You sometimes feel her presence watching you.
